articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the absurdity and appeal of 58-year-old Mike Tyson's fight with Jake Paul in Texas on Friday.
articles.title: Mike Tyson vs Jake Paul: The absurdity and appeal of Friday's fight in Texas

articles.description: Claudio Ranieri's return to Roma will provide a steady pair of hands for the Serie A club, writes Mina Rzouki.
articles.title: Claudio Ranieri: Roma return for Italian will provide steady pair of hands

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs are the only unbeaten team in the NFL. Their trip to the Buffalo Bills on Sunday is a potential dress rehearsal for a play-off showdown, writes Phoebe Schecter.
articles.title: Buffalo Bills v Kansas City Chiefs: Can Josh Allen's team beat Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce and co?

articles.description: England have invested time and expertise in their new high-tempo defence. As the defeats stack up, have they got enough faith to see it through against the world champions?
articles.title: England v South Africa: Can hosts keep faith in the blitz?

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary, score updates and match stats as Scotland take on Croatia in the UEFA Nations League.
articles.title: UEFA Nations League LIVE: Scotland vs Croatia - radio commentary & live text

articles.description: England fast bowler Jofra Archer is not shortlisted for the Indian Premier League auction for 2025 but James Anderson is included.
articles.title: IPL 2025 auction: Jofra Archer not on shortlist but James Anderson included

articles.description: Rory McIlroy trails leader Antoine Rozner by one shot after round two of the DP World Tour Championship in Dubai.
articles.title: Race to Dubai: Rory McIlroy one shot off leader Antoine Rozner at DP World Tour Championship

articles.description: One of Great Britain’s most successful road cyclists, Lizzie Deignan, will retire at the end of next season.
articles.title: Lizzie Deignan to retire from cycling after 2025

articles.description: Britain's Tom Aspinall says he was not allowed to attend Thursday's UFC 309 news conference promoting the heavyweight title fight between Jon Jones and Stipe Miocic.
articles.title: UFC 309: Tom Aspinall told he told he could not attend Jon Jones-Stipe Miocic news conference

articles.description: Ireland have come under criticism since their loss to New Zealand in Dublin a week ago. Was the defeat a blip or part of a trend?
articles.title: Ireland vs Argentina: Andy Farrell's side out to prove All Blacks loss just a blip
